trans-unit.source: Exercise – Create a Leasing Agreement with a Down Payment

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – Create a Leasing Agreement with a Down Payment

trans-unit.source: Customer R-30000 rents item R-30000-02 (JLB VRX918S 18 in. Subwoofer) so often that they have asked the rental company if it would consider a lease agreement with an option to buy the item.

seg-source.mrk: Customer R-30000 rents item R-30000-02 (JLB VRX918S 18 in. Subwoofer) so often that they have asked the rental company if it would consider a lease agreement with an option to buy the item.

trans-unit.source: On January 27, 2019, the rental company and the customer agree that one unit of item R-30000-02 over the course of two months (February 1st – March 31st) is 75.00 per month (billed prepaid) with a 150.00 down payment. At the end of the leasing agreement, the customer can buy the item for 850.00.

seg-source.mrk: On January 27, 2019, the rental company and the customer agree that one unit of item R-30000-02 over the course of two months (February 1st – March 31st) is 75.00 per month (billed prepaid) with a 150.00 down payment.
At the end of the leasing agreement, the customer can buy the item for 850.00.

trans-unit.source: Create the Rent Order and Lease Agreement

seg-source.mrk: Create the Rent Order and Lease Agreement

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create the rent order and lease agreement:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create the rent order and lease agreement:

trans-unit.source: Set the work date to 01/27/19.

seg-source.mrk: Set the work date to 01/27/19.

trans-unit.source: Insert a new rent order for customer R-30000.

seg-source.mrk: Insert a new rent order for customer R-30000.

trans-unit.source:
On the first line of the Lines FastTab, enter the following:
  1. Type = Item
  2. No. = R-30000-02
  3. Quantity = 1

seg-source.mrk: On the first line of the Lines FastTab, enter the following:
• Type = Item
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">No.
• Quantity = 1

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Leasing Agreement.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Leasing Agreement.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New.

trans-unit.source: In the Starting Date field, enter 02/01/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Starting Date field, enter 02/01/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Contract Period field, type 2M.

seg-source.mrk: In the Contract Period field, type 2M.

trans-unit.source: In the Rental Rate Code field, enter Month.

seg-source.mrk: In the Rental Rate Code field, enter Month.

trans-unit.source: In the Down Payment field, type 150.

seg-source.mrk: In the Down Payment field, type 150.

trans-unit.source: In the Leasing Rate field, type 50.

seg-source.mrk: In the Leasing Rate field, type 50.

trans-unit.source: Select the Prepaid check box.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Prepaid check box.

trans-unit.source: In the Sales Amount field, type 850.

seg-source.mrk: In the Sales Amount field, type 850.

trans-unit.source: : Leasing Agreement page

seg-source.mrk: : Leasing Agreement page

trans-unit.source: Create the Down Payment Order

seg-source.mrk: Create the Down Payment Order

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create the Down Payment Order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create the Down Payment Order:

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Create Down Payment Order.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Create Down Payment Order.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the confirmation message that “Order XXXX was created.”

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the confirmation message that “Order XXXX was created.”

trans-unit.source: Notice that the Down Payment Order No. field on the Leasing Agreement page contains the number noted in the confirmation message.

seg-source.mrk: Notice that the Down Payment Order No.
field on the Leasing Agreement page contains the number noted in the confirmation message.

trans-unit.source: : Leasing Agreement page with down payment order number

seg-source.mrk: : Leasing Agreement page with down payment order number

trans-unit.source:
On the ribbon, click Open Down Payment Order. Notice the following:
  • Date fields are set to the Work Date
  • G/L account specified in the Leasing Account field on the General Posting Setup page is used
  • Unit Price is set to the Down Payment amount on the Leasing Agreement

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Open Down Payment Order.
Notice the following:
• Date fields are set to the Work Date
• G/L account specified in the Leasing Account field on the General Posting Setup page is used
• Unit Price is set to the Down Payment amount on the Leasing Agreement

trans-unit.source: : Down Payment sales order

seg-source.mrk: : Down Payment sales order

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Sales Order page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Sales Order page.

trans-unit.source:
Click OK to close the Leasing Agreement pages and return to the Rent Order. Notice that the:
  • Leasing field is set to Yes on the rent order line.
  • Information from the Leasing Agreement transferred to the rent order line

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Leasing Agreement pages and return to the Rent Order.
Notice that the:
• Leasing field is set to Yes on the rent order line.
• Information from the Leasing Agreement transferred to the rent order line

trans-unit.source: : Leasing indicated on the rent order line

seg-source.mrk: : Leasing indicated on the rent order line

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: With the Ship option selected, click OK. The following message appears:

seg-source.mrk: With the Ship option selected, click OK.
The following message appears:

trans-unit.source: : Error message received from attempting to ship a rent order with an open Down Payment Order

seg-source.mrk: : Error message received from attempting to ship a rent order with an open Down Payment Order

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the error message.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the error message.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Leasing Agreement.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Leasing Agreement.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Open Down Payment Order.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Open Down Payment Order.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: With the Ship and Invoice option selected, click OK.

seg-source.mrk: With the Ship and Invoice option selected, click OK.

trans-unit.source:
On the ribbon of the Leasing Agreement page, click Refresh. Notice that the:
  • Down Payment Order No. field is now blank
  • Posted Down Payment No. field contains the posted sales order number

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon of the Leasing Agreement page, click Refresh.
Notice that the:
• Down Payment Order No.
field is now blank
• Posted Down Payment No.
field contains the posted sales order number

trans-unit.source: : Posted Down Payment Order information on Leasing Agreement

seg-source.mrk: : Posted Down Payment Order information on Leasing Agreement

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Leasing Agreement page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Leasing Agreement page.

trans-unit.source: Ship and Invoice the Rent Order

seg-source.mrk: Ship and Invoice the Rent Order

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to ship and invoice the Rent Order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to ship and invoice the Rent Order:

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: With the Ship option selected, click OK.

seg-source.mrk: With the Ship option selected, click OK.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 02/01/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Posting Date field, enter 02/01/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 02/28/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 02/28/19.

trans-unit.source: Click OK and accept all confirmation messages.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK and accept all confirmation messages.

trans-unit.source: Open the Service Invoice Rental and notice that the line is to be posted to the Leasing Prepayment Account.

seg-source.mrk: Open the Service Invoice Rental and notice that the line is to be posted to the Leasing Prepayment Account.

trans-unit.source: Post the invoice and then return to the Rent Order.

seg-source.mrk: Post the invoice and then return to the Rent Order.

trans-unit.source: Set the Work Date to 03/01/19.

seg-source.mrk: Set the Work Date to 03/01/19.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon of the Rent Order, click Home > Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon of the Rent Order, click Home > Post.

trans-unit.source: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 03/01/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Posting Date field, enter 03/01/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 03/31/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 03/31/19.

trans-unit.source: Click OK and accept all confirmation messages.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK and accept all confirmation messages.

trans-unit.source: Open and post the Service Invoice Rental.

seg-source.mrk: Open and post the Service Invoice Rental.

trans-unit.source: Sell the Leased Item

seg-source.mrk: Sell the Leased Item

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to sell the leased item from the Rent Order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to sell the leased item from the Rent Order:

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 03/31/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Posting Date field, enter 03/31/19.

trans-unit.source: On the Rent Order line, enter 03/31/19 in the Rental Return Date field.

seg-source.mrk: On the Rent Order line, enter 03/31/19 in the Rental Return Date field.

trans-unit.source: In the Return Qty. to Receive field, enter 1.

seg-source.mrk: In the <span class="Bold">Return Qty.
to Receive field, enter 1.

trans-unit.source: Use the “Choose Columns” function to add the Sell Item from Rent field to the Lines FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Use the “Choose Columns” function to add the Sell Item from Rent field to the Lines FastTab.

trans-unit.source: Select the Sell Item from Rent check box on the rental item line.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Sell Item from Rent check box on the rental item line.

trans-unit.source: : Rent Order with updated return information and sale setting

seg-source.mrk: : Rent Order with updated return information and sale setting

trans-unit.source:
On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Sales Allocation. Notice that the:
  • Invoiced Rental Profit field is populated with the total amount that has been invoiced for the rental position.
  • Non-Charge Sales Price field is populated with the Sales Amount from the Leasing Agreement.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Sales Allocation.
Notice that the:
• Invoiced Rental Profit field is populated with the total amount that has been invoiced for the rental position.
• Non-Charge Sales Price field is populated with the Sales Amount from the Leasing Agreement.

trans-unit.source: : Sales Allocation with information from Leasing Agreement

seg-source.mrk: : Sales Allocation with information from Leasing Agreement

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Sale from Rental page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Sale from Rental page.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon of the Rent Order, click Home > Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon of the Rent Order, click Home > Post.

trans-unit.source:
Select the Receive option and then click OK. Notice the following:
  • The return was processed on the original item line (and any relevant rate components).
  • A Sales line is added that contains the calculated Sales Price as the Unit Price.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Receive option and then click OK.
Notice the following:
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">The return was processed on the original item line (and any relevant rate components).
• A Sales line is added that contains the calculated Sales Price as the Unit Price.

trans-unit.source: : Sales line added to returned rent order

seg-source.mrk: : Sales line added to returned rent order

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: With the Ship option selected, click OK.

seg-source.mrk: With the Ship option selected, click OK.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 03/31/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Posting Date field, enter 03/31/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 03/31/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 03/31/19.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to create the invoice and then accept all confirmation messages.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to create the invoice and then accept all confirmation messages.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Navigate > Invoices.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Navigate > Invoices.

trans-unit.source: Open the invoice and notice that item R-30000-02 appears on the line with the calculated Sales Price as the unit price.

seg-source.mrk: Open the invoice and notice that item R-30000-02 appears on the line with the calculated Sales Price as the unit price.

trans-unit.source: : Sales invoice for the leased item

seg-source.mrk: : Sales invoice for the leased item

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post and then click Yes to post the invoice.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post and then click Yes to post the invoice.

trans-unit.source: Escape back to the rent order.

seg-source.mrk: Escape back to the rent order.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: If the return was already posted, manually create a Sales Order from the Rent Order by clicking Actions > Create Sales Order on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: If the return was already posted, manually create a Sales Order from the Rent Order by clicking Actions > Create Sales Order on the ribbon.
